TITLE: Travel Tips for Ho Chi Minh City
DESCRIPTION: Essential information and helpful tips to make your visit to Ho Chi Minh City safe and enjoyable.

VISA.TITLE: Visa Requirements
VISA.CONTENT: Most visitors need a visa to enter Vietnam. Check requirements and apply online through the official e-visa portal.

MONEY.TITLE: Currency & Payments
MONEY.CONTENT: Vietnamese Dong (VND) is the local currency. ATMs are widely available, and many places accept cards, but keep some cash handy.

PHONE.TITLE: Mobile & Internet
PHONE.CONTENT: Local SIM cards are affordable and provide good coverage. Free Wi-Fi is available in most cafes and restaurants.

GRAB.TITLE: Grab Services
GRAB.CONTENT: Grab is a popular ride-hailing app offering car, bike, and food delivery services. It's safe and prices are fixed.

BUS.TITLE: Public Buses
BUS.CONTENT: Buses are the cheapest way to travel. Get a bus map and remember your stop's name in Vietnamese.

MOTORBIKE.TITLE: Motorbike Safety
MOTORBIKE.CONTENT: If renting a motorbike, always wear a helmet and carry proper documentation. Traffic can be challenging for newcomers.

VALUABLES.TITLE: Protecting Valuables
VALUABLES.CONTENT: Keep valuables secure and be aware of your surroundings, especially in crowded areas.

TRAFFIC.TITLE: Traffic Safety
TRAFFIC.CONTENT: Look both ways and walk steadily when crossing streets. Motorbikes may drive on sidewalks.

SCAMS.TITLE: Common Scams
SCAMS.CONTENT: Be cautious of unusually friendly strangers and always agree on prices before services.

TEMPLES.TITLE: Temple Visits
TEMPLES.CONTENT: Remove shoes before entering temples and dress modestly. Ask permission before taking photos.

DRESS.TITLE: Dress Code
DRESS.CONTENT: Dress modestly, especially when visiting religious sites. Light, breathable clothing is recommended.

BARGAINING.TITLE: Bargaining Tips
BARGAINING.CONTENT: Bargaining is common in markets. Start at 50% of the initial price and negotiate friendly.

RAINY.TITLE: Rainy Season
RAINY.CONTENT: May to November brings afternoon showers. Carry a light raincoat or umbrella.

HEAT.TITLE: Heat Protection
HEAT.CONTENT: The city is hot year-round. Stay hydrated and use sun protection.

BEST_TIME.TITLE: Best Time to Visit
BEST_TIME.CONTENT: December to April offers the most pleasant weather with less rain and lower humidity.

DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Get our comprehensive travel guide in PDF format for offline access or printing.
